main event: A UFO sighting involving three circular orange objects in a 'V' formation over Bowling Green, Kentucky on 16 February 1955.
interesting points: The objects were observed for 15 minutes with vapor trails visible., The sighting involved 3 to 8 objects in a V formation., The course of the objects was to the south., The report suggests possible explanations including balloons or aircraft., The sighting took place at night on the campus of Western Kentucky State Teachers College.
sighted object: three circular orange objects in a V formation
witness description: Joe Henry Cha Potter, a 31-year-old college student
